name: TUNNEL.WAD
description: Lately, the sewers beneath the moonbase you are stationed at have been acting oddly. No plumbing works, the base is overheated, something isn't right. Then earlier this morning, a man was pulled through his shower drain by something... it wasn't a pretty sight. Now something has to be done. As you stand before the entrance to the sewer tunnels you take a glance back at your watching comrades and wonder if you'll ever see them again...
